website_summaries.verdict: Realistic and precise, this racing wheel offers an authentic racing feel with fine-tuned forced feedback.
pros: Feel every detail of the “road” with this feature-packed racing setup
The textured wheel looks like the real thing, and the rotation angle is adjustable to fit your game and driving style
The wheel wears sequential paddle shifters for ultra-quick reactions, and the force feedback system boosts immersion to new heights
Compatible with PC and Xbox One
cons: This setup is expensive, and some gamers may miss the clutch pedal

customer_reviews.title: Great steering and pedal set at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant set of steering wheel and pedals, ideal for me and my 8 year old son to compete with each other on Forza Horizon 3. I couldn't get used to driving on a game pad, this made things much better for me :) We're using it with our Xbox One S.
customer_reviews.author: B. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Force feedback is a game changer, literally.
customer_reviews.text: My first force feedback wheel so can make no comparisons but the step up from a wheel with no force feedback is immense. I literally cannot drive in games with a wheel without force feedback now it is amazing. The feeling you get as you hold a rally can in a perfect drift around a hairpin bend in unlike anything else. If you are buying this wheel though I definitely recommend stretching to the T3PA pedals. Other than not much to say really, great wheel that's worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Kit

customer_reviews.title: If you're looking to get a wheel just get this you wont be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Given it a 5 as it does everything I expected it don't have a previous wheel to compare but the wheel is great. The build quality is good and the force feedback is brilliant doesn't feel clunky. I've always enjoyed racing games but now it's gone to another level using the wheel. I would recommend Dirt Rally. The feeling of getting the car sidewards over a crest through the woods and not crashing is almost as good as sexy (almost) joking aside for the price it's a no brained if you're looking to go for a wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The product was mis sold as only having cosmetic damage, however the pedal system was defective. The acceleration gas pedal did not work at all as the spring was broken. After several very irritating chat sessions I was only offered a 20% discount or refund. After escalating the issue further and asking for a working product I was given Amazon credit in my wallet to purchase a replacement pedal. Many thanks to Ashish
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Great force feedback wheel for pc
customer_reviews.text: Love it, feels responsive and good force feedback. Took a bit of fiddling to get the settings that worked for me, and takes a while to re-learn how to play driving games, but so worth it. Forza 7 times are now improving all the time!
customer_reviews.author: J. White

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic force feedback steering wheel! I have read elsewhere that the pedals aren’t the best but personally I have no problems with them. It does take a bit of setting up to get it feeling right, especially the strength of the force feedback, which for f1 games I set to around 40. The clamp works well on my desk which is exactly 5cm thick. You might get away with fixing it to a surface a few mm thicker but not much more.
customer_reviews.author: Felix46

customer_reviews.title: Great steering wheel and pedals
customer_reviews.text: I have been giving this steering wheel and pedals a good thrashing since December. It has been a real pleasure using them with my X-box one and playing Forza 7. Excellent value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Gideon

customer_reviews.title: Item DOES NOT WORK!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these for my son, and my return date is only four days past the limit. The pedals do not work and I can not contact the supplier to get a replacement. Avoid at all costs because if it does not work then you can not get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Talbot-Sykes

customer_reviews.title: Another excellent Thrustmaster product
customer_reviews.text: I use this mainly for forza games, but after years of using the standard controller it is taking me a while to adjust to using a wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Gerrard

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun
customer_reviews.text: Love using the wheels makes the racing more fun and the force feedback is excellent
customer_reviews.author: g33man

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Purchased , delivery quick - son has upgraded the pedals as these are not the pedals he wanted but it worked out cheaper to purchase this way
customer_reviews.author: al

customer_reviews.title: I like the feel of it when playing racing games for ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the feel of it when playing racing games for example F1, Forza motorsport and other racing games plus feeling the vibration of the handling of the cars in racing simulations games.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas D.

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy some parts broke after 2nd time of use
customer_reviews.text: The wheel is ok but some parts broke just after 2nd time using so i think you can get more sturdy one for the price but if there is no more options its ok works fine
customer_reviews.author: Ramunas

customer_reviews.title: recommend
customer_reviews.text: bought for birthday present for my grandson he loves it so do the rest of the family 😂
customer_reviews.author: maggy fegan

customer_reviews.title: All good.
customer_reviews.text: Works nicely with Forza Horizon 4 on Xbox. Bought from Telephones Online, delivered quickly and well packaged. 12month warranty. Uk plug with is hard wired into steering wheel base, not like a laptop style adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Wheel at a Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant Racing Wheel, would recommend to anyone looking to buy a entry level steering wheel at a good price. As well as this the force feedback is amazing, but would recommend a good sturdy stand as the wheel force feedback vibrates quite a lot.
customer_reviews.author: julie bennett

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Feels very heavy and unrealistic compared to other wheels. Also very noisy as its belt driven. Now broken after 5 months.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Hamblett

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, very durable and very responsive and strong. Definitely worth a buy.
customer_reviews.author: Aiden

customer_reviews.title: Poor
customer_reviews.text: Defective - pedals only operate intermittently for a few minutes at a time..... unhappy Christmas gift. Steering wheel good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Transforms gaming experience with Forza 6. Paired with GT Omega Steering Wheel stand
customer_reviews.author: Penny Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great entry level racing wheel
customer_reviews.text: Great entry level racing wheel. Force feedback is terrific. The rubber can wear ur hands out after a few hours drifting on forza horizon but apart from that worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: J Lawton

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! LOVE the Force Feedback and it feels realistic! Would recommend to friends!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son have a lot of fun. Perhaps too much behind the wheel but this is my fault.
customer_reviews.author: Draccel

customer_reviews.title: Expected better quality
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine the first 6 months then started making weird clicky noise + the self alignment was off to the right (same side the clicky noise was coming from when turning)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good force feedback wheel
customer_reviews.text: Good level of feedback through the steering wheel makes driving games a lot more realistic. Bought as a present for my 12 year old son, and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: smunns

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked alright for a month then the force feed back stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good fun for couple of months, but pedals are now not working?
customer_reviews.author: julia

customer_reviews.title: Clamp broke the housing out of the wheel
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the actual wheel, it has great force feedback and makes any driving game 100% more fun. Unfortunately I am not happy with the clamp the product came with, as when tightened up, it pulled the housing out of the wheel and broke, which rendered the wheel useless. I have had to solve this problem with a G clamp. I know this isn't the most expensive wheel on the market but I expected more considering the £146 price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wheely wheely bad
customer_reviews.text: Worked for about 2 minutes, then the car flew off the track and the console could not detect the wheel anymore. Tried all the so-called solutions like unplugging power and reconnecting everything, but the wheel remains unresponsive and I'm having to send it back. I would recommend AVOIDING this probably badly-made product.
customer_reviews.author: Croftville

customer_reviews.title: I am sure this product is great but we haven't been able to use it
customer_reviews.text: I am sure this product is great but we haven't been able to use it. The USB cable it came with too short to stretch between the xbox and where you are sitting with the steering wheel. Now trying to find a USB extension cable on Christmas eve and a disappointed son on his birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Shipp

customer_reviews.title: Beware - they simply stuck the address label on the box itself.
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe it - they simply stuck my address label on the box itself. I like to keep the boxes I buy things in, in case I want to resell - no point with this one. But the big, crushing disappointment, is that my son answered the door to the delivery driver, and had his Christmas surprise present ruined. Thanks for that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke in the first 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Whilst I had it it was a fun bit of kit. I played assetto, race room and Forza horizon 3 with this, but when I wen to play Forza horizon 4 a couple of months ago when it came out the system was broken. No reason at all it had been sitting in the same place it always had with no issue, I had not even an led turn on, in the past months or so I’ve been trying to find fixes such as fuses and new p2 cables but that didn’t work. So overall my experience I quite frankly terrible, so 2 stars as it was fun when it worked
customer_reviews.author: ty d.

customer_reviews.title: Thrustmaster TMX Feedback Racing Wheel X Box One
customer_reviews.text: My son and I love playing video games together and this is an excellent addition to our gaming fun!! It offers a chance to get into the feel of racing rather than just watching it across the screen as you push buttons etc.... The wheel clamps to a desk top and away you go....it is sturdy enough to handle turns and although the resistance isn't exact, it is still engaging and my son loves it!! This is a well made and sturdy piece of gaming equipment This is our first gaming steering wheel and we are both happy and well impressed,
customer_reviews.author: Marx1977

customer_reviews.title: Superb Racing Wheel
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic wheel for the price. Currently playing Forza 6 and Horizon 2. The wheel looks and feels great, force feedback is strong and positive. The wheel base is quite noisy and does hum a bit more than the T150 which I have for PS4, but you don't notice with a headset on. Also the wheel is thinner in thickness of the rim than the T150. Would highly recommend for the price, great mid range entry level wheel which brings new life into your racing game collection. Kris Stone Plymouth Devon
customer_reviews.author: Kris S.

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: Used only a few times on heavy force feedback and the plastic drive cogs sheared teeth, rendered useless
customer_reviews.author: stuart brown

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and interesting addition to my range of Xbone accessories
customer_reviews.text: This is a well-packaged, sturdy and interesting addition to my range of Xbone accessories. It's not as flimsy as I thought it would be, especially with the way I tend to stomp pedals. I used this on Forza and it took some getting used to after years of using just a controller. At first I thought it wasn't as responsive, but after playing around with the sensitivity settings I found this to be a much more enjoyable (and practical?) way of gaming. This is a great addition and gift for any gamer, though it's quite bulky and not so easy to store away. One for the kid's rooms I suspect!
customer_reviews.author: writeallthereviews

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: This is my first gaming wheel and I am just amazed. This makes the gaming experience in Forza completely different to using the regular X-box controllers. This gives you the real driving experience rather than something artificial. I am afraid I cannot compare it to other racing wheels as I haven't tried them, but I have been impressed. It is bit bulky and you need to make sure that it is secure when you play, especially for people who get a bit carried away.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Dalby

customer_reviews.title: Jaw droppingly good.
customer_reviews.text: I've been after a decent steering wheel for Forza Horizon 2 for a long time. I have to say this has completely floored me. So good. The feedback really makes you feel like you're driving a real car. The pedals are very responsive too and the whole thing just feels great to use. Well pleased.
customer_reviews.author: J-Mac

customer_reviews.title: Really good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with it so far, Iv'e had this for 2 weeks now and Iv'e been playing Forza Horizon 3 and Forza 6 Motorsport and so far so good! Force feedback feels good and all the buttons including shifters work very nicely with the wheel's design. The pedals are not the best there are but they do the job and are good enough! Overall good quality and good price!
customer_reviews.author: João Tiago

customer_reviews.title: duscusted by amazon and this product.
customer_reviews.text: horrible product, first of all i pay the amount asking WITH AMAZON PRIME so should have been next day delivery, the delivery takes 10 working days and then i open the wheel up and its missing a part to be honest just a horrible experience wouldnt reccomend it to anyone ever!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Thrustmaster TMX Force Feedback Racing Wheel (Xbox One)
product_meta.description: Thrustmaster TMX FORCE FEEDBACK UK VERSION WHEEL 4468008 Gaming Game Controllers
feature_bullets: Official racing simulator for Xbox One and Windows
Drive system with adjustable force feedback lets you feel every detail while you're racing
Mixed belt-pulley and gears system with metal ball-bearing axle

Internal memory and upgradeable firmware;Robust and versatile attachment system, compatible with all mounts;Realistic "competition" wheel design - 11"/28 cm in diameter, with an ergonomic design perfectly adapted for all racing games;2 large, wheel-mounted sequential paddle shifters;Built-in official buttons for Xbox One: Xbox Guide button, View and Menu;Official embedded software: the racing wheel is automatically recognized by the Xbox One

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars69 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
